mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_board ( TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER, HIT_CNT, DEL_GB, THUMBNAIL, LIKE_CNT ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, 0, 'N', #{thumbnail}, 0 )

INSERT INTO tb_board_map ( PARENT_ID, MAP_SRC, LAT_1, LNG_1, LAT_2, LNG_2, LAT_3, LNG_3, LAT_4, LNG_4, LAT_5, LNG_5, PLACE_1, PLACE_2, PLACE_3, PLACE_4, PLACE_5 ) VALUES ( #{parent_id}, #{map_src}, #{lat_1}, #{lng_1}, IFNULL(#{lat_2}, 0), IFNULL(#{lng_2}, 0), IFNULL(#{lat_3}, 0), IFNULL(#{lng_3}, 0), IFNULL(#{lat_4}, 0), IFNULL(#{lng_4}, 0), IFNULL(#{lat_5}, 0), IFNULL(#{lng_5}, 0), #{place_1}, #{place_2}, #{place_3}, #{place_4}, #{place_5} )
mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_board WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ) AS TOTAL_COUNT, TITLE, B_ID, TITLE, WRITER, HIT_CNT, (date_format(CREA_DTM, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i')) AS CREA_DTM, THUMBNAIL, LIKE_CNT, ( SELECT count(*) FROM tb_comment WHERE PARENT_ID = B_ID AND DEL_GB = 'N' ) AS CMT_CNT FROM tb_board WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY B_ID DESC LIMIT #{START}, #{END}

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_board WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' AND ${searchCondition} LIKE '%${searchWord}%' ) AS TOTAL_COUNT, B_ID, TITLE, WRITER, HIT_CNT, (date_format(CREA_DTM, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i')) AS CREA_DTM, THUMBNAIL, LIKE_CNT, ( SELECT count(*) FROM tb_comment WHERE PARENT_ID = B_ID AND DEL_GB = 'N' ) AS CMT_CNT FROM tb_board WHERE ${searchCondition} LIKE '%${searchWord}%' AND DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY B_ID DESC LIMIT #{START}, #{END}
SELECT B_ID, TITLE, WRITER, HIT_CNT, (date_format(CREA_DTM, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i')) AS CREA_DTM, THUMBNAIL, LIKE_CNT FROM tb_board WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY LIKE_CNT DESC, CREA_DTM DESC LIMIT 3
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_board SET HIT_CNT = NVL(HIT_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE B_ID = #{B_ID}
UPDATE tb_board SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE B_ID = #{B_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tb_liketable WHERE B_ID = #{B_ID} AND LIKE_PEOPLE_NICK = #{NICKNAME}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_liketable WHERE B_ID = #{B_ID} AND LIKE_PEOPLE_NICK = #{NICKNAME}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_board SET LIKE_CNT = NVL(LIKE_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE B_ID = #{B_ID}
UPDATE tb_board SET LIKE_CNT = NVL(LIKE_CNT, 0) - 1 WHERE B_ID = #{B_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT B_ID, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENTS, HIT_CNT, (date_format(CREA_DTM, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i')) AS CREA_DTM, (date_format(MOD_DTM, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i')) AS MOD_DTM, LIKE_CNT, ( SELECT MAP_SRC FROM tb_board_map WHERE PARENT_ID = B_ID ) AS MAP_SRC FROM tb_board WHERE B_ID = #{B_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_board_map SET MAP_SRC = #{map_src}, LAT_1 = IFNULL(#{lat_1}, 0), LNG_1 = IFNULL(#{lng_1}, 0), LAT_2 = IFNULL(#{lat_2}, 0), LNG_2 = IFNULL(#{lng_2}, 0), LAT_3 = IFNULL(#{lat_3}, 0), LNG_3 = IFNULL(#{lng_3}, 0), LAT_4 = IFNULL(#{lat_4}, 0), LNG_4 = IFNULL(#{lng_4}, 0), LAT_5 = IFNULL(#{lat_5}, 0), LNG_5 = IFNULL(#{lng_5}, 0) PLACE_1 = #{place_1}, PLACE_2 = #{PLACE_2}, PLACE_3 = #{place_3}, PLACE_4 = #{place_4}, PLACE_5 = #{place_5} WHERE PARENT_ID = #{B_ID}
